welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brasschaat, the charming city known for its beautiful parks and greenery. We invite you to explore our city and enjoy all that it has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
